<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Jaidz (Fearless Claw)](/Deities.aspx?ID=122)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Forgive cowards and offer them guidance, encourage others to test their mettle, face and learn from your fears

**Anathema** Punish another creature for cowardice, routinely avoid that which scares you

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)

- **7th**
[Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185)

</column>
name: Jaidz (Fearless Claw)
